name: Amped Wireless ACA1 High Power 500mW Dual Band AC Wi-Fi USB Adapter - Ultra-fast 802.11ac for Mac and Windows PC, 2 x 5d

reviews.name: Amped Wireless ACA1 High Power 500mW Dual Band AC Wi-Fi USB Adapter - Ultra-fast 802.11ac for Mac and Windows PC, 2 x 5d
reviews.reviewText: NICE GET'S THE JOB DONE GOOD RECEPTION AND VERY RELIABLE.
reviews.title: NICE

reviews.name: Amped Wireless ACA1 High Power 500mW Dual Band AC Wi-Fi USB Adapter - Ultra-fast 802.11ac for Mac and Windows PC, 2 x 5d
reviews.reviewText: I love this adapter and don't see a reason for my desktop or laptop to be wired anymore. I get 130+ MBPS from speedtest.net on both with this adapter and AC router. Would recommend this to anyone that need the speed or internet load like I have at my house.
reviews.title: Great Speed and Support

reviews.name: Amped Wireless ACA1 High Power 500mW Dual Band AC Wi-Fi USB Adapter - Ultra-fast 802.11ac for Mac and Windows PC, 2 x 5d
reviews.reviewText: I've loved this since the day I bought it. Use it everyday with my MacBook Pro and can reach any wifi from almost anywhere.
reviews.title: Amazing Signal Strength and Speed!

reviews.name: Amped Wireless ACA1 High Power 500mW Dual Band AC Wi-Fi USB Adapter - Ultra-fast 802.11ac for Mac and Windows PC, 2 x 5d
reviews.reviewText: Have had this for about a month ago and am really p;leased with its performance. It has always been a struggle to get a good signal on the second floor. This not only gives me a very strong ("excellent") signal, it also picks up all three of the access points in my home, giving me a choice of connections. I was thinking about buying a PCIe card for my desktop, but this unit makes that unnecessary.
reviews.title: Solved my problem
